plot: Yuli, 17, is in love with Daniel, a guy from her school, but is too shy to admit it. Tamara, her best friend, is anything but shy. Tonight, at Daniel's party, Tamara will push Yuli to make a move
title: Duvdevanim
plot_es: Yuli, 17, is in love with Daniel, a guy from her school, but is too shy to admit it. Tamara, her best friend, is anything but shy. Tonight, at Daniel's party, Tamara will push Yuli to make a move
plot_en: Yuli, 17, is in love with Daniel, a guy from her school, but is too shy to admit it. Tamara, her best friend, is anything but shy. Tonight, at Daniel's party, Tamara will push Yuli to make a move
